features.description: The base64 converter provided by {siteName} is a free tool that helps you convert base64 to text immediately. Below are some of the main features of this online utility.

item1.description: There are no charges associated with the usage of this online base64 converter. You can use this utility for free and make as many conversions as you desire. You don’t need to get yourself registered to download the results.
item1.title: 100% Free

item2.description: You don’t need to follow any convoluted procedure or download any software for accessing this base64 decoder. It is a web-based utility that can be easily accessed with a stable internet connection.
item2.title: Easily Accessible

item3.description: he user-friendly interface of this base64 code translator allows you to translate base64 to text online without any manual effort. You don’t need to acquire professional assistance to use this online facility.
item3.title: User-friendly Interface

item4.description: The base64 code translator provides 100% accurate results. This online utility uses advanced algorithms to process your entered base64 value and convert it into accurate textual form instantly.
item4.title: Accurate Results

item5.description: This free base64 translator is compatible with all devices. Whether you’re using an Android, Mac, iOS, Linux, or Windows device, this online utility efficiently works on all devices.
item5.title: Compatibility

item6.description: This base64 code converter provides fast and secure conversion to its users. You don't have to worry about the security of your uploaded data. All the entered data is automatically removed from the database, as soon as the conversion is completed. We’ll not save or share our user’s data with any third party vender.
item6.title: Data Security

howToUse.description: With our base64 to text converter, you can convert and understand lengthy numerical codes of base64 easily. Follow the below steps to use this base64 translator: In a few simple steps, you will get the specific results just the way you want your base64 values to be converted in text.

steps.step3: Click on Convert button, The result will appear immediately in the result box

metaData.title: Base64 to text and viceversa

what.description: Base64 is a group of binary-to-text encoding schemes that transforms binary data into a sequence of printable characters, limited to a set of 64 unique characters. More specifically, the source binary data is taken 6 bits at a time, then this group of 6 bits is mapped to one of 64 unique characters.
what.title: What is Base64?

what.description: When beginning web development, programmers use either a numerical system translator such as a hex converter or an assembly language. Assembly language comprehends the same instructions in numeric codes as a machine language, but the data commands and variables are translated into readable English alphabets, rather than just numbers.
what.title: What is Hexadecimal Number System?

dataPrivacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. We promise not to store or pass on any of the data that you send to us via our online conversion, encode or decode tools. The data that you send to us will simply be converted in the way that you require and the results sent back to you. For the extra security of an encrypted connection please also enable SSL.
dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy

pageDescription.description: "{siteName}" is a versatile web application designed to streamline various development tasks in one convenient platform. From converting hex and base64 to text to providing an online SVG code editor, SQL editor, and a multi-language code editor with execution capabilities, {siteName} caters to developers and tech enthusiasts alike. Whether you need to manipulate data, write SQL queries, or code in languages like C# and Java, {siteName} has you covered with an intuitive, accessible online interface.
pageDescription.title: {siteName} The Ultimate Online Code and Data Conversion Toolkit

codeEditor.title: Code Editor
codeEditor.tooltip: A versatile online code editor supporting multiple programming languages, including C# and Java. With built-in code execution capabilities, you can write, test, and debug code right in your browser.

base64.title: Base64
base64.tooltip: Encode or decode Base64 data, a common encoding scheme used for data transfer and storage. This tool helps you quickly convert Base64 strings to readable text or files.

hex.title: Hex
hex.tooltip: Convert hexadecimal data to text and vice versa. Hexadecimal is a base-16 number system used in computing and digital electronics.

sql.title: SQL Formatter
sql.tooltip: Format SQL code online with this handy tool. Choose your preferred language, tab width, and case settings to generate clean, readable SQL scripts.

svg.title: SVG
svg.tooltip: Edit SVG code online with this versatile tool. Preview your SVG images and download them in various formats.

whoBenefit.description: Whether you're a software developer, data analyst, or hobbyist, {siteName} has something for everyone. Here are some ideal use cases:

item1.description: Streamline your coding process with our multi-language code editor, allowing you to write and execute code quickly.
item1.title: Software Developers

item2.description: Use our data conversion tools to manipulate various data formats seamlessly.
item2.title: Data Analysts

item3.description: Edit SVG code directly in your browser to create and modify scalable vector graphics on the go.
item3.title: Designers & Creators

whoBenefit.title: Who Can Benefit from {siteName}?

whyUse.description: {siteName} is more than just a code editor—it's a comprehensive toolkit built to make your development process faster, more efficient, and secure. Here’s what sets us apart:

item1.description: Say goodbye to switching between different tools. With {siteName}, you have everything you need in one place, from code execution and data conversion to specialized editors for SQL and SVG.
item1.title: All-in-One Platform

item2.description: We prioritize your data security by employing industry-standard encryption and secure execution environments. Whether you’re running code or handling sensitive data, {siteName} ensures your work remains private and protected.
item2.title: Enhanced Security

item3.description: Designed for both beginners and experienced developers, our platform offers a clean and intuitive interface, enabling you to focus on what matters most—your work.
item3.title: User-Friendly Interface

item4.description: Access your tools from anywhere, anytime. As a web-based platform, {siteName} provides the flexibility to work on your projects across devices without the need for local installations or updates.
item4.title: Cloud-Based Convenience

whyUse.title: Why Choose {siteName}?
